name.jp: ケストラル・ブルーム

description.en: Similar to the Magic Broom but with a little added style and speed! Maximum Speed: 33 km/h.
description.ar: Similar to the Magic Broom but with a little added style and speed! Maximum Speed: 33 km/h.
description.br: Uma Vassoura mágica com doses de estilo e velocidade! Velocidade Máxima: 33km/h.
description.cns: 和仙女扫帚很像，但多了点创意和速度！最大速度 33 km/h。
description.de: Ähnlich dem magischen Besen, aber mit mehr Style und Geschwindigkeit! Höchstgeschwindigkeit: 33 km/h.
description.fi: Similar to the Magic Broom but with a little added style and speed! Maximum Speed: 33 km/h.
description.fil: Similar to the Magic Broom but with a little added style and speed! Maximum Speed: 33 km/h.
description.fr: Balai volant de niveau inférieur (33 km/h).
description.id: Mirip dengan Magic Broom tetapi dengan sedikit style dan style tambahan! Kecepatan Maksimum: 33 km/jam.
description.it: Similar to the Magic Broom but with a little added style and speed! Maximum Speed: 33 km/h.
description.jp: マジック・ブルームにも似ているが、見た目もスピードも改善されたホウキ。最高速度:33 km/h
description.kr: Magic Broom과 비슷하지만 스타일과 속도가 약간 추가되었습니다! 최고 속도 : 33km/h.
description.nl: Similar to the Magic Broom but with a little added style and speed! Maximum Speed: 33 km/h.
description.pl: Similar to the Magic Broom but with a little added style and speed! Maximum Speed: 33 km/h.
description.ru: Похожа на обычную летающую метлу, но чуть более красивая и быстрая. Максимальная скорость: 33 км/ч.
description.sp: Similar a la Escoba Mágica, ¡pero con un poco más de estilo y velocidad! Velocidad Máxima: 33 km/h.
description.sw: Similar to the Magic Broom but with a little added style and speed! Maximum Speed: 33 km/h.
description.th: คล้ายกับ Magic Broom แต่เพิ่มสไตล์และความเร็วเล็กน้อย! ความเร็วสูงสุด: 33 กม./ชม.
description.vi: Tương tự như Magic Broom nhưng có thêm một chút phong cách và tốc độ! Tốc độ tối đa: 33 km/h.
